first.name: Harold
first.content: Greetings! |I presume you're the new Rabbit Trail Manager we just hired. I'm Dr. Harold, from the Tracking and Surveillance department. Let me be the first to welcome you to [b][color=#3399ff]Rabbit Procural Technologies[/color][/b].

greetings_harriet_1.name: Harriet
greetings_harriet_1.content: The rest of us not-nerds call it [b][color=#3399ff]R-Tech[/color][/b].|@@Hi, I'm Harriet, ASH Specialist extraordinaire.

greetings_harold_2.name: Harold
greetings_harold_2.content: That's Animal Safety and Handling Specialist, by the way. We may be a startup, but sometimes we sling acronyms like a corporation.

greetings_harriet_2.name: Harriet
greetings_harriet_2.content: Relax, Harold, they'll pick it up soon enough.

greetings_harold_3.name: Harold
greetings_harold_3.content: That's [i]Dr.[/i] Harold, excuse me. And you are, technically, Dr. Harriet.

greetings_harriet_3.name: Harriet
greetings_harriet_3.content: Jeez, I said [i]relax[/i]. Anyway, I'm sure our friendly new RTM would like to move on and actually learn what they're going to do.
